document.full_text: carlos ghosn, renault's chief, escaped with his job monday, but a debacle over false charges of industrial spying cost the carmaker's chief operating officer and six others their posts.
document.title: shake-up at renault over 'chain of failures'
lines_and_colors: carlos ghosn, renault's chief, escaped with his job monday, but a debacle over false charges of industrial spying cost the carmaker's chief operating officer and six others their posts.
